usageGuide.title: Usage Guide
usageGuide.item1: Click the 'Start Recognition' button to begin speech recognition
usageGuide.item2: Recognized text will be displayed in real-time on the screen
usageGuide.item3: Click the 'Stop Recognition' button to stop speech recognition
usageGuide.item4: Click the 'Play Text' button to hear the recognized text as speech
usageGuide.item5: Use the 'Reset' button to clear the recognized text
